name: AstaReal® Japan Water Soluble Emulsion
description:
AstaReal® Japan Water Soluble Emulsion is a 1% water-soluble astaxanthin emulsion. Excellent solubility in any kind of drinks, and unrivaled transparency and clarity makes this ingredient one of a kind in the industry. Stable across a wide pH range, good heat tolerance enables pasteurization or UHT treatment, no oil ring formation. Great compatibility with a variety type of beverage, so truly ideal for ready-to-drink products. Add multiple health benefits to your beverage products with our water soluble liquid.

This Product is available in Ukraine, Russia, Thailand, Malaysia, Indonesia, Philippines, Singapore, Korea, Vietnam, Hong Kong, India, Taiwan, Pakistan and any other Asian countries.
